notes: Screening predicates determine project eligibility.
Defines default carbon fraction for biomass.
Root-to-shoot ratio defaults for trees and shrubs.
Excluded pools contribute zero emissions by rule.
Computes aboveground carbon from dry mass and CF.
Applies 44/12 stoichiometric factor to convert carbon.
Net project emissions equation across carbon pools and leakage.
Sums activity-shifting and market leakage components.
Specifies revisit interval and protocol consistency for plots.
Triggers discount when precision exceeds threshold.
Suppresses shrub carbon when crown cover below 5%.
Annualizes carbon stock change over monitoring period.
Requires SOP and QA/QC documentation for inventories.
